title: Import Products

response_message: Initiated Importing products, You will be notified by a mail once the products are imported successfully
import_message: Upload in progress. You will be informed by email

errors.title: Error
errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action!

amazon.instructions:
Import from Amazon is available only for Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr and Amazon.it.
You have to authorise a developer (Name: "payever GmbH", ID: "1915-8175-1543") in your seller central before import.

google.instructions_1: You have to add "{{ google_email }}" as admin in your merchant center before import.
google.import_failed: Import failed due to an unexpected error.
google.account_does_not_match_merchant_id: This Google account does not match the Merchant ID
